shots.prompt: Cinematic shot, night, rain-slicked narrow city alley, neon signs casting lurid bleeding colors on wet brick walls, single flickering streetlight casting sickly yellow light. Ava (30s), weary face, dark hair pulled back, green eyes, wearing a threadbare grey scarf and a dark, worn jacket, huddles in shadows, pulling scarf tighter. Her eyes dart nervously towards the alley entrance. She clutches a small, worn brown leather pouch. Moody, atmospheric lighting, shallow depth of field.
shots.negative: blurry, low quality, low resolution, static, no motion, inconsistent character appearance, poor lighting, bad composition, oversaturated, cartoonish, anime
